mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cns_cinfo ( ROWGUID, SERIALNUM, RQSTPERSON, RQSTTIME, RQSTNUMBER, LINKNUMBER, RQSTAREACODE, RQSTADDRESS, RQSTTYPE, ACCORDTYPE, RQSTTITLE, RQSTCONTENT, RQSTSOURCE, REGISTERNAME, CSTATUS, ISIMPT, FINISHTIME ) VALUES ( #{rowGuid}, #{serialNum}, #{rqstPerson}, #{rqstTime}, #{rqstNumber}, #{linkNumber}, #{rqstAreaCode}, #{rqstAddress}, #{rqstType}, #{accordType}, #{rqstTitle}, #{rqstContent}, #{rqstSource}, #{registerName}, #{cStatus}, #{isImpt}, #{finishTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SERIALNUM = VALUES(SERIALNUM), RQSTPERSON = VALUES(RQSTPERSON), RQSTTIME = VALUES(RQSTTIME), RQSTNUMBER = VALUES(RQSTNUMBER), LINKNUMBER = VALUES(LINKNUMBER), RQSTAREACODE = VALUES(RQSTAREACODE), RQSTADDRESS = VALUES(RQSTADDRESS), RQSTTYPE = VALUES(RQSTTYPE), ACCORDTYPE = VALUES(ACCORDTYPE), RQSTTITLE = VALUES(RQSTTITLE), RQSTCONTENT = VALUES(RQSTCONTENT), RQSTSOURCE = VALUES(RQSTSOURCE), REGISTERNAME = VALUES(REGISTERNAME), CSTATUS = VALUES(CSTATUS), ISIMPT = VALUES(ISIMPT), FINISHTIME = VALUES(FINISHTIME)
